body:
Comment 1: 
race_detector.html oppression continues :)

Andrew, you've restored the links in:
https://golang.org/issue/7275

But now
http://tip.golang.org/doc/articles/race_detector.html
again redirects to
http://blog.golang.org/

This also affects http://tip.golang.org/doc/ page.
And there is another bug -- http://tip.golang.org/blog/race-detector redirects just to
http://blog.golang.org/.
_Owner changed to @adg._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
